Articles.Content:
Hello, I have an issue and I hope that I´m not that retarded to overlook something. I can´t display (on map, no icons, can´t buy, manage or launch from them) any other bases around Kerbin other than tracking stations. I played with mod settings, tried different saves (Career), but can´t figure it out. I have KerbinSide Complete with GAP contract pack, installed via CKAN. Do I need to max out VAB and SPH or Administration or something else to being able to purchase another bases to launch off? Also, is there a hotkey or any other way to disable ATC and NGS while flying with rocket (Other than in mod settings)? It´s awesome for planes, but distracting while launching rockets. Thanks in advance, your mod is awesome by the way! Thank you for all your work.

EDIT: Yeah and playing on 1.1.3, if that´s the issue, please ignore my post.

Edited June 25, 2016 by Wolfox

hi alphaash, i have a project you might be interested in, im using blender to proceedually generate buildings to be placed into ksp and i was wondering if i might be able to incude some of your buildings in it, so far i am bilding the assets from scratch but it might be nice to diversify the buildings somewhat, give me a shout if you're interested or anything
Does this work with KSP 1.1.3/is there a new one?
Does this work in RSS?

4 minutes ago, Gman_builder said:

Does this work in RSS?

Short answer: no

9 hours ago, blowfish said:

Short answer: no

Ya I tried it out and was disappointed. ): This needs to work with RSS. It would make the RSS aircraft experience that much better. Imagine taking off from LAX and flying for 5 hours to land at HIA and refueling then flying back. That would be so cool.

FAQs in opening posts are your friend, and explain many a thing.

Quote

Q - Any support of rescaled Kerbin/Kerbol systems like RSS?

A - No, sorry. That'd need a lot of manual replacement of objects and/or some serious coding in Kerbal Konstructs that I don't want to do.

 

Long of it is that placing the statics is tedious and irritating.  You want it, it'll be up to you to make it.

There's a newly released version of Kerbal Konstructs made for 1.1.3. Is there any chance that this version of Kerbin Side will work properly as is with that, or should I wait warmly until @AlphaAsh releases a KS for 1.1.3?

1 minute ago, King Something said:

There's a newly released version of Kerbal Konstructs made for 1.1.3. Is there any chance that this version of Kerbin Side will work properly as is with that, or should I wait warmly until @AlphaAsh releases a KS for 1.1.3?

Where is that KK version for 1.1.3 ?

Just now, brusura said:

Where is that KK version for 1.1.3 ?

https://spacedock.info/mod/124/Kerbal Konstructs

It was uploaded by @ozraven, who has the necessary permissions to update @AlphaAsh's Space Dock page but cannot update that thread's OP.

4 hours ago, King Something said:

There's a newly released version of Kerbal Konstructs made for 1.1.3. Is there any chance that this version of Kerbin Side will work properly as is with that, or should I wait warmly until @AlphaAsh releases a KS for 1.1.3?

Most of KerbinSide is just scenery and configuration files that Kerbal Konstructs uses. The locations and the buildings placed there are configured specifically for stock scale Kerbin, not Earth in real, half or otherwise scale. There's no viable way for Kerbal Konstructs to reinterpret Kerbin coordinates for Earth. What would be needed is for each site in KerbinSide to be recreated specifically for the desired scale of Earth, in the same painstaking way that the locations were done for Kerbin, using the editing tools Kerbal Konstructs provides.

That said, I am a RSS newb so I might be wrong - I can stand to be corrected if so! I am however becoming more familiar with the KK code as I'm working on a couple small things for the next update. I'm a big fan of how KSP can be so customized to everyone's preferred style of play, so I want to give my best effort to making KK work well with RSS so that others can build cool places to go.

4 hours ago, King Something said:

https://spacedock.info/mod/124/Kerbal Konstructs

It was uploaded by @ozraven, who has the necessary permissions to update @AlphaAsh's Space Dock page but cannot update that thread's OP.

Yep. It's a little confusing right now - I'm not quite ready to start a new thread for Kerbal Konstructs. I'd very much like input from the RSS players on Kerbal Konstructs - what issues there are with it and RSS, new ideas, examples of common RSS setups with KK, etc.

On 5/25/2016 at 5:04 PM, AlphaAsh said:

One good thing about failing to tender for a contract. Plenty of time to play the hell out of Stellaris and plug on with some unfinished work for Kerbin-Side.

Another go at a modular airport.


I like to make SketchUp sweat.

You can design all the parts with curved or sloped edges and just let them clip into each other.   I recommend using sloped edges instead of curves, though.

hello, i am a new user of this mod. its nice to fly to other locations and buy in career new ground stations. In the tracking station i can click at the radar buttion. at the airport on the island near ksc flashes a circle (radar signal or range)

I cant find any manual how to use it. What advantage or disadvantage i have with or without the radarstation???

thanks for answer
Simple question: Does this mod work with 1.1.3
How can I change the flags and nations for locations? I'd like my KSC to have an "American" flag, and KSC2 to be "Russian," along with varied other things.

On 6/13/2016 at 6:47 AM, AlphaAsh said:

It would. There's a lot of assets in Kerbin-Side that I want to update to fit more modular base layouts, as this will also be useful for some of the new gameplay features I want to implement through KK, such as base founding, base expansion and building upgrades. The 'space program tycoon/4x' stuff I want in my KSP.

Could this mean destructible bases too?
How do I make a custom base?

For some reason I seem to be getting this at the end of KSC's runway:

Spoiler

That's not supposed to be there, is it? And if not, how do I get rid of it?

On 8/7/2016 at 10:09 AM, Capt. James T. Kirman said:

For some reason I seem to be getting this at the end of KSC's runway:

  Reveal hidden contents

That's not supposed to be there, is it? And if not, how do I get rid of it?

That looks like something else entirely!  And where did your runway lights go?!

Edited August 8, 2016 by Beetlecat

21 hours ago, Beetlecat said:

That looks like something else entirely!  And where did your runway lights go?!

I assume they're underneath that floating platform thing that's probably not supposed to be there.

On 8/7/2016 at 10:09 AM, Capt. James T. Kirman said:

For some reason I seem to be getting this at the end of KSC's runway:

  Reveal hidden contents

That's not supposed to be there, is it? And if not, how do I get rid of it?

I think the simplest thing to try is re-installing Kerbinside.
